titleStmt.title: The humble representation and petition of divers vvel-affected gentlemen, free holders, and others of the county of Oxon Presented to the supream authority of the nation, the Commons in Parliament Assembled, April 6. 1649. VVith the speech of Mr. Butler at the delivery of the said petition, and the speakers answer thereunto.

The humble representation and petition of divers vvel-affected gentlemen, free holders, and others of the county of Oxon Presented to the supream authority of the nation, the Commons in Parliament Assembled, April 6. 1649. VVith the speech of Mr. Butler at the delivery of the said petition, and the speakers answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Butler, Mr., fl. 1649.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spred-Eagle at the West-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
